Plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.
Title: Dazed and Confused
Actors: Jason London, Joey Lauren Adams, Milla Jovovich, Shawn Andrews
tomatoConsensus: Featuring an excellent ensemble cast, a precise feel for the 1970s, and a killer soundtrack, Dazed and Confused is a funny, affectionate, and clear-eyed look at high school life.
